question: Which artist won the most Grammy Awards of all time?
funFact: Georg Solti, a Hungarian-British conductor, won 31 Grammy Awards, the most of any artist.

question: Which female artist has won the most Grammy Awards?
funFact: Beyoncé has won 32 Grammy Awards, making her the most awarded female artist and the most awarded artist overall.

question: Which album won Album of the Year in 2020?
A: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?
funFact: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go? by Billie Eilish won Album of the Year at the 2020 Grammys.

funFact: bad guy by Billie Eilish won Record of the Year at the 2020 Grammys.

funFact: Billie Eilish won Song of the Year for 'bad guy' at the 2020 Grammys.
